title.rendered: Need to get CMMC Compliant? Have Plan of Action & Milestones

content.rendered:
Plan of Action & Milestones (POA&M) to complete your CMMC certification process.

As a DoD subcontractor on the CMMC journey, you’re likely going to need to have a Plan of Action & Milestones, or POA&M to complete your certification process. In this episode, Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT will discuss:

  • Benefits of a comprehensive POA&M
  • Key points to keep in mind when creating your POA&M
  • What should be included for an effective POA&M
  • How milestones are used in a strong POA&M
  • Tips that will help you as you prepare for your audit Want more education on CMMC?

    Want to know exactly where you stand before you make any big security moves?

    Take a self-assessment to find out where your strengths and weakness are and make informed decisions.

excerpt.rendered: In this video, Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT will discuss: -Benefits of a comprehensive POA&M -Key points to keep in mind when creating your POA&M -What should be included for an effective POA&M -How milestones are used in a strong POA&M -Tips that will help you as you prepare for your audit Want more education on CMMC? Take a snapshot of your IT environment against CMMC requirements with a DIY
